name: 英文（三）：觀光英文
restrict: ◎必須先修過【共同英文(一)】◎必須先修過【共同英文(二)】
description: 在出國旅遊如此盛行的年代，如果可以更加確實地掌握觀光英語，除了能增加旅遊的方便性，也更能幫助我們理解其他國家的文化。本課程為欲學習觀光英語及相關旅遊知識的人所設計，其最大特色在協助修課學生日後出國旅遊之時，能夠更有勇氣與自信開口說英文。甚至讓有志者將來從事觀光旅遊業時，具備基本的觀光英語專業知識與溝通表達之技能。
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣

**Course description and goals**

This course aims to build and strengthen students' overall English proficiency in travel and tourism. 

The topics covered in this ESP (English for Specific Purpose) course include the English needed for planning trips, departure procedures, passing immigration and customs, taking a plane, hotels, transport, restaurants, shopping, communication, etc.    

Students are expected to enhance their travel English skills through participating various communicative language activities in class. Through extensive coursework, by the end of the course students shall be able: (1) to broaden their vocabulary and sentence patterns in travel English, (2) to improve their oral English communicative skills (3) to acquire intercultural communicative competence, and (4) to understand trip itineraries and create trip schedules.  
 

**Textbook**

Jordens, R. & Jordens, T. (2009). Talk about Travel: English for Airlines, Hotels, and Tours. (2nd Edition). Compass Publishing.
